title: Google\Cloud\Trace\Sampler\SamplerFactory
name: SamplerFactory
description: The SamplerFactory builds SamplerInterface instances given a variety of configuration options.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds a sampler given the provided configuration options.

params.name: options.type
params.description: Which type of sampler to build. May be one of: "qps", "random", "enabled", "disabled". Defaults to "qps".

params.name: options.rate
params.description: The sampling rate for query per second and random sampling. Defaults to 0.1.

params.name: options.cache
params.description: The PSR-6 cache implementation to use for query per second sampling.

params.name: options.cacheItemClass
params.description: The name of the CacheItemInterface class to use for query per second sampling.

params.name: options.cacheKey
params.description: The name of the cache key to use for query per second sampling.
